io.r2dbc.spi

Interface TransactionDefinition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IsolationLevel

    public interface TransactionDefinition
    Specification of properties to be used when starting a transaction. This interface is typically implemented by code that calls Connection.beginTransaction(TransactionDefinition).
    Since:
    0.9
    See Also:
    Connection.beginTransaction(TransactionDefinition), Option

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static Option<IsolationLevel> ISOLATION_LEVEL

      Lock wait timeout.

      Name of the transaction.
      static Option<Boolean> READ_ONLY
      The transaction mutability (i.e.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      <T> T getAttribute(Option<T> option)
      Retrieve a transaction attribute by its Option identifier.

    • Field Detail

      • ISOLATION_LEVEL

        static final Option<IsolationLevel> ISOLATION_LEVEL
        Isolation level requested for the transaction.

      • READ_ONLY

        static final Option<Boolean> READ_ONLY
        The transaction mutability (i.e. whether the transaction should be started in read-only mode).

      • NAME

        static final Option<String> NAME
        Name of the transaction.

      • LOCK_WAIT_TIMEOUT

        static final Option<Duration> LOCK_WAIT_TIMEOUT
        Lock wait timeout.

    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        @Nullable
<T> T getAttribute(Option<T> option)
        Retrieve a transaction attribute by its Option identifier. This low-level interface allows querying transaction attributes supported by the Connection that should be applied when starting a new transaction.
        Type Parameters:
        T - requested value type
        Parameters:
        option - the option to retrieve the value for
        Returns:
        the value of the transaction attribute. Can be null to indicate absence of the attribute.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if name or type is null
